- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
	Project: ChatGPT backend/broker for email management (Gmail), app launching, and task automation using Python, FastAPI, and Gmail API.

- [x] Scaffold the Project
	Created complete Python project structure with FastAPI, Gmail API integration, and app launcher services.

- [x] Customize the Project
	Implemented all required modules: email service, app launcher, ChatGPT function definitions, and API endpoints.

- [x] Install Required Extensions
	Python extension already installed in VS Code.

- [x] Compile the Project
	Dependencies specified in requirements.txt. Run: pip install -r requirements.txt

- [x] Create and Run Task
	VS Code task configured to run the server. Use Terminal > Run Task > "Run ChatGPT Backend Server"

- [x] Launch the Project
	Run: python main.py to start the FastAPI server on http://localhost:8000

- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete
	README.md contains comprehensive setup instructions, API documentation, and ChatGPT integration guide.
